trans-unit.resname: Join us and discover traditional villages and beautiful places full of life and nature

trans-unit.resname: The Latin Quarter of Paris, known as the Quartier Latin, is a charming district located in the heart of the city. Famous for its bohemian atmosphere and rich intellectual history, it is home to the Sorbonne University and Notre-Dame Cathedral. Cobblestone streets, antique bookshops, and cozy cafés create a unique ambiance. It’s a gathering spot for students, artists, and culture lovers, with a vibrant mix of shops, restaurants, and nightlife.
trans-unit.source: The Latin Quarter of Paris, known as the Quartier Latin, is a charming district located in the heart of the city. Famous for its bohemian atmosphere and rich intellectual history, it is home to the Sorbonne University and Notre-Dame Cathedral. Cobblestone streets, antique bookshops, and cozy cafés create a unique ambiance. It’s a gathering spot for students, artists, and culture lovers, with a vibrant mix of shops, restaurants, and nightlife.
trans-unit.target: El Barrio Latino de París, conocido como el Quartier Latin, es un distrito encantador ubicado en el corazón de la ciudad. Famoso por su atmósfera bohemia y rica historia intelectual, alberga la Universidad de la Sorbona y la Catedral de Notre-Dame. Calles empedradas, librerías antiguas y acogedores cafés crean un ambiente único. Es un punto de encuentro para estudiantes, artistas y amantes de la cultura, con una vibrante mezcla de tiendas, restaurantes y vida nocturna.

trans-unit.resname: The Quartier Latin, is a fascinating enclave nestled in the historic heart of the City of Light. This picturesque district has served as the cultural and intellectual epicenter of the city for centuries. Its name derives from Latin, the language spoken in medieval universities. At the core of the Latin Quarter stands the renowned Sorbonne University, founded in the 13th century, whose cloisters and lecture halls have nurtured great thinkers, philosophers, and writers throughout history. This venerable institution counts among its alumni luminaries like René Descartes and Marie Curie. The neighborhood also hosts one of Paris's most iconic landmarks, the majestic Notre-Dame Cathedral. With its soaring Gothic architecture and intricate details, the cathedral stands as a silent witness to centuries of history and has inspired countless artists and writers. The Latin Quarter's narrow cobblestone streets breathe bohemian and artistic charm. Here, antiquarian bookshops, art galleries, and independent boutiques mingle with traditional cafés and brasseries that invite visitors to pause and watch the world go by. Vine-covered façades and colorful shuttered windows add extra allure to this almost cinematic neighborhood.
trans-unit.source: The Quartier Latin, is a fascinating enclave nestled in the historic heart of the City of Light. This picturesque district has served as the cultural and intellectual epicenter of the city for centuries. Its name derives from Latin, the language spoken in medieval universities. At the core of the Latin Quarter stands the renowned Sorbonne University, founded in the 13th century, whose cloisters and lecture halls have nurtured great thinkers, philosophers, and writers throughout history. This venerable institution counts among its alumni luminaries like René Descartes and Marie Curie. The neighborhood also hosts one of Paris's most iconic landmarks, the majestic Notre-Dame Cathedral. With its soaring Gothic architecture and intricate details, the cathedral stands as a silent witness to centuries of history and has inspired countless artists and writers. The Latin Quarter's narrow cobblestone streets breathe bohemian and artistic charm. Here, antiquarian bookshops, art galleries, and independent boutiques mingle with traditional cafés and brasseries that invite visitors to pause and watch the world go by. Vine-covered façades and colorful shuttered windows add extra allure to this almost cinematic neighborhood.
trans-unit.target: El Barrio Latino es un fascinante enclave situado en el corazón histórico de la Ciudad de la Luz. Este pintoresco distrito ha servido como epicentro cultural e intelectual de la ciudad durante siglos. Su nombre deriva del latín, la lengua hablada en las universidades medievales. En el centro del Barrio Latino se erige la renombrada Universidad de la Sorbona, fundada en el siglo XIII, cuyos claustros y aulas han formado a grandes pensadores, filósofos y escritores a lo largo de la historia. Esta venerable institución cuenta entre sus antiguos alumnos con luminarias como René Descartes y Marie Curie. El barrio también alberga uno de los monumentos más icónicos de París, la majestuosa Catedral de Notre-Dame. Con su imponente arquitectura gótica y sus intrincados detalles, la catedral se erige como testigo silencioso de siglos de historia y ha inspirado a innumerables artistas y escritores. Las estrechas calles empedradas del Barrio Latino respiran encanto bohemio y artístico. Aquí, librerías anticuarias, galerías de arte y boutiques independientes se mezclan con cafés y brasseries tradicionales que invitan a los visitantes a hacer una pausa y observar el mundo pasar. Las fachadas cubiertas de enredaderas y las ventanas con persianas coloridas añaden un atractivo adicional a este barrio casi cinematográfico.

trans-unit.resname: Do you know medieval Paris? To discover it, we recommend joining this free tour of Le Marais, one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in the French capital. We’ll also explore the history of the Bastille!
trans-unit.source: Do you know medieval Paris? To discover it, we recommend joining this free tour of Le Marais, one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in the French capital. We’ll also explore the history of the Bastille!
trans-unit.target: ¿Conoces el París medieval? Para descubrirlo, te recomendamos unirte a este tour gratuito del Marais, uno de los barrios más pintorescos de la capital francesa. ¡También exploraremos la historia de la Bastilla!

trans-unit.resname: Do you know Paris's art trail? To discover it, we recommend joining this free tour of the French capital's renowned cultural institutions. We'll also explore the historic Faubourg district !
trans-unit.source: Do you know Paris's art trail? To discover it, we recommend joining this free tour of the French capital's renowned cultural institutions. We'll also explore the historic Faubourg district !
trans-unit.target: ¿Conoces la ruta artística de París? Para descubrirla, te recomendamos unirte a este tour gratuito de las renombradas instituciones culturales de la capital francesa. ¡También exploraremos el histórico distrito de Faubourg!

trans-unit.resname: Under Paris' nocturnal cloak, the Galeries Lafayette shimmer with elegance. The Opéra Garnier rises majestically, its illuminated façade glowing like a jewel. At Place Vendôme, twinkling lights dance in harmony with the classical architecture. The city dresses in its finest at every corner.
trans-unit.source: Under Paris' nocturnal cloak, the Galeries Lafayette shimmer with elegance. The Opéra Garnier rises majestically, its illuminated façade glowing like a jewel. At Place Vendôme, twinkling lights dance in harmony with the classical architecture. The city dresses in its finest at every corner.
trans-unit.target: Bajo el manto nocturno de París, las Galerías Lafayette brillan con elegancia. La Ópera Garnier se alza majestuosamente, su fachada iluminada resplandece como una joya. En la Plaza Vendôme, las luces parpadeantes bailan en armonía con la arquitectura clásica. La ciudad se viste con sus mejores galas en cada esquina.

trans-unit.resname: Embark on an unforgettable tour starting at the iconic Arc de Triunfo, exploring Paris's elegant boulevards. Wander through the city's opulent avenues where elegance comes to life, and culminate your adventure at the majestic Eiffel Tower.
trans-unit.source: Embark on an unforgettable tour starting at the iconic Arc de Triunfo, exploring Paris's elegant boulevards. Wander through the city's opulent avenues where elegance comes to life, and culminate your adventure at the majestic Eiffel Tower.
trans-unit.target: Embárcate en un tour inolvidable comenzando en el icónico Arco de Triunfo, explorando los elegantes bulevares de París. Pasea por las avenidas opulentas donde la elegancia cobra vida, y culmina tu aventura en la majestuosa Torre Eiffel.

trans-unit.resname: This picturesque bohemian neighborhood in Paris is famous for its artistic charm and cobblestone streets. At its summit stands the iconic Sacré-Cœur Basilica, offering panoramic views of this unique, history-filled city.
trans-unit.source: This picturesque bohemian neighborhood in Paris is famous for its artistic charm and cobblestone streets. At its summit stands the iconic Sacré-Cœur Basilica, offering panoramic views of this unique, history-filled city.
trans-unit.target: Este pintoresco barrio bohemio de París es famoso por su encanto artístico y sus calles empedradas. En su cima se erige la icónica Basílica del Sacré-Cœur, que ofrece vistas panorámicas de esta ciudad única, llena de historia.

trans-unit.resname: Discover the essence of Paris on a journey that begins at the feet of the majestic Notre-Dame Cathedral. Let yourself be enchanted by streets that breathe history, façades that whisper centuries of art, and the unrivaled splendor of the Louvre Museum. An experience that will transport you to the very heart of Parisian beauty.
trans-unit.source: Discover the essence of Paris on a journey that begins at the feet of the majestic Notre-Dame Cathedral. Let yourself be enchanted by streets that breathe history, façades that whisper centuries of art, and the unrivaled splendor of the Louvre Museum. An experience that will transport you to the very heart of Parisian beauty.
trans-unit.target: Descubre la esencia de París en un viaje que comienza a los pies de la majestuosa Catedral de Notre-Dame. Déjate encantar por calles que respiran historia, fachadas que susurran siglos de arte, y el esplendor incomparable del Museo del Louvre. Una experiencia que te transportará al mismo corazón de la belleza parisina.
